The best bar

Horrible place to eat at!!! a plate of calamari is 16 dollars and they serve you only six pieces of thin calamari on a bed of wet salad and tostones, ordered wings and they weren‚Äôt wings they were just pieces of chicken also just six on a bed of fries last thing I ordered were salchipapas only 6 pieces of hot dog and everything else was just French Fries. When I asked for water they wanted to charge me for a 3 dollar water bottle. They did not want to give just a regular cup of water with ice! The food is very expensive and they give you basically bites. The only thing I like was that they have a backside it was nicely done and they have tvs out in the back.
Excelente lugar y servivio
It's very expensive.

I order to pick up the same from this place a soup , now they have the scam to charge you tips plus taxes on it for a pick up order, basically a soup costs you $23 insane.  I guess they lost one more loyal customer

Total scam!!!! Worst food ever not authentic. The margaritas was trash. They charge $10 for beer with lime and salt but the charge $5 for only beer. So it cost $5 to add salt and lime. Total scam.

Por el puntaje de este lugar ten√≠a mejores expectativas de este lugar , con la comida que ordene.motepillo,humitas,Morocho, pero deserci√≥n as√≠ de mi parte ., la humita ü´î estaba dulce y el resto los dej√≥ a su criterio

Total rip off. First off , when I walked in " the owner " Luis  valdes ( who is one of the people who left 5 stars in these reviews ) was drinking and didn't acknowledge I had came in for about 5 minutes. After that my wife and I drank a‚Ä¶

Went here trying to support a new local business,  and honestly at first not to bad music wise. However being from the area my whole life,  you will feel robbed by the time you leave. Luckily I bartneded 6 years of of n life and didn't cause a scene just told the owner he was basically robbing people.  My wife and I always look for good music and us being colombian we liked their music. We spent a good time there drank only beer. For those who are Latin will know most women drink their beer as a "michelada". Depending where you are from it may come with hot sauce or just Limon and salt.  Point is, when we got our bill my 6 beers were 30dollars (normal) my wife's 5 beers were 50(10 bucks a beer) . I asked to speak to the manager and he decided not to come out only tell the server , "tell him that's what we charge." I was chagered 5 bucks for a cup with Limon and salt in other words. When he finally came put and I told him this plus added salt in a store is less then 4 bucks he replied "I am a business and if salt cost 1 cent , I can still charge 5 bucks " . Granted that my be ture but nowhere I ever been , have someone try to charge me for a cup of salt and Limon rim. Total rip off !

Absolutely disgusting. Don‚Äôt even waste your time. I went in there trying to support a new business but I left disappointed. I should of cook at home instead of coming here to leave hungry, minus -$70 to end up going to a different restaurant.
Great! Ecuadorean food. Very Welcoming and Friendly attention. Service is great! Food is amazing, budget friendly as well. I always come in and out with a very pleasant experience.

My 1st time there and invited by my fellow Ecuadorian friend Cesar Alvarez and last night was SALSA night with DJ Andy Rodriguez who's ALWAYS on point!!!

My friends and I had a blast!  The chaulafan and empanadas was AMAZING!!!  5 Stars and salsa music is every Thursday starting at 6pm is what Cesar told me...
La. Atenci√≥n. Es. Excelente.    La.   La. Comida. Es. Muy. Bueno.
Exelente servicio personal muy atento,comida deliciosa y mucha variedad de bebidas que no te puedes decidir cual tomar,lo recomiendo y definitivamente volvere.
Muy agradable este sitio mejor dicho muy limpio y la tencion super
